## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Plant at position (-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, -0.5)
- Boiler at (-6.5, 0.0) connected to offshore pump via pipes
- Steam engine at (-2.5, 0.5) connected to boiler via pipes
- Power network (id=818) connecting to all mining drills

### Secondary Power Plant at position (-15.5, -3.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-15.5, -3.5)
- Boiler at (-12.0, -4.5) connected to offshore pump via pipes (currently fueled with coal)
- Steam engine at (-8.5, -4.5) connected to boiler via pipes
- Power network (id=5262) connecting to mining drills

### Iron Ore Mining and Smelting Facility at position (15.5, 70.5)
Consists of:
- 5 Electric mining drills at:
  - (15.5, 70.5) - no power
  - (18.5, 70.5) - output blocked
  - (21.5, 70.5) - output blocked
  - (24.5, 70.5) - output blocked
  - (27.5, 70.5) - output blocked
- 5 Iron smelting furnaces at:
  - (16.0, 68.0) - no ingredients, fuel full
  - (19.0, 68.0) - no ingredients, fuel full
  - (22.0, 68.0) - no fuel
  - (25.0, 68.0) - no fuel
  - (28.0, 68.0) - no fuel
- 5 Steel smelting furnaces at:
  - (16.0, 65.0) - no ingredients, fuel full
  - (19.0, 65.0) - no ingredients, fuel full
  - (22.0, 65.0) - no fuel
  - (25.0, 65.0) - no fuel
  - (28.0, 65.0) - no fuel
- 5 Burner inserters between iron and steel furnaces
- 5 Wooden chests at output positions
- 5 Burner inserters connecting drills to chests

## ERROR TIPS

### Belt connection errors (new)
- Cannot connect transport belts directly to chests - must use inserters as intermediaries
- Verify target entity type before attempting belt connections

### Placement distance errors (continued)
- Repeated attempts to place entities while too far away (distance > 10)
- Move closer to target position before placement attempts

### Power connection issues (new)
- Failed to properly connect power to mining drills
- Verify power pole placement and connections
- Check entity power requirements before placement

### Fluid system connection errors (new)
- Failed to connect boiler to steam engine properly
- Verify fluid connection points are unobstructed
- Check fluid flow direction requirements

### Output blockage issues (continued)
- Mining drills repeatedly blocked due to output space issues
- Clear output areas before starting mining operations
- Ensure proper belt/chest connections to receive mined materials

### Entity placement conflicts (continued)
- Attempted placements in occupied positions
- Verify position is empty before placing new entities using get_entities_at()
- Remove existing entities before attempting new placements

### Assertion failures (continued)
- Power status assertions failing for mining drills
- Address root power connection issues before asserting status
